name: Outrageous Skip Loader Fight
description:
Are you the competitive type looking for Action and Adrenaline full challenge? This is it!
Outrageous Skip Loader Fight is an amazing game with different and challenging worlds.
The goal is simple; but not to achieve it! Just reach the end eliminating all the opponents without getting into too many collisions . Sounds easy? Prove it!
With amazing graphics,Action effects and animation you will get hooked from the beginning!
